title: Smite did 55% of my health in one use
body: I just finished a game of ranked was a losing game I was {{champion:516}} had really tanked up towards the end but after one fight i saw something crazy on the death recap {{champion:102}}  had done 257 with her flamebreath no big deal and 132 with her R but  2255 true damage with her {{summoner:11}} 55% of my health almost instantly gone. i understand that it has the Dot and her press the attack but still 2255 true damage on smite there are Ults that dont even do that much damage let alone true damage

replies.body: Do you really think death recap will ever be accurate? xd?

I had a death recap 2 games ago where I assisted in my own death for 27% of the damage dealt

Recap logic

just keep in mind that true damage isn't amplified by anything, including press the attack :p

else... death recap... flash killing you... drake with shyv lightning.. it is funny if you know what killed you and don't care
